title: Blended Intensive Elementary Chinese Language Learning Design

context.additional_context: Role-playing in simulated environments based on real-world contexts, integrated with VR-based cultural immersion experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately read and write over 150 basic Chinese characters.
Learners can perform simple conversations using 300 basic vocabulary items required for daily communication.
Learners are assessed on practical Chinese communication skills through role-playing reflecting cultural contexts in VR simulation environments.
Learners can receive feedback twice weekly via formative assessments and adjust their learning plans accordingly.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
